title: The Skogai Notation System
content: The $ namespace defines a complete symbolic notation system for expressing relationships between entities. Key symbols include: $ for definition/reference, | for choice, _ for anything/nothing, @ for intent to act, . for belonging, : for continuation, = for equivalence, and -> for directed action. This notation enables precise expression of entity relationships, messages, and transformations within the ecosystem.
summary: A symbolic language for defining relationships and actions
